TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapSource extends System.Windows.Media.ImageSource
Public MustInherit Class BitmapSource Inherits ImageSource
public ref class BitmapSource abstract : System::Windows::Media::ImageSource
type BitmapSource = class inherit ImageSource interface DUCE.IResource

summary.span: 代表特定大小與解析度之像素的單一且固定的集合。

span.span: Represents a single, constant set of pixels at a certain size and resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的基本建置組塊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]映像處理管線，在概念上代表在特定大小和解析度的像素單一的常數集合。 is the basic building block of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] imaging pipeline, conceptually representing a single, constant set of pixels at a certain size and resolution. A可能會提供解碼器，映像檔中的單一框架，或可能是運作於轉換的結果自己。A could be a single frame in an image file that a decoder provides, or it could be the result of a transform that operates on a of its own. 不使用以表示多重框架影像或動畫。 is not used to represent a multi-frame image or an animation. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 原生支援壓縮和解壓縮[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]映像。natively supports compression and decompression of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] images. 解碼案例中，點陣圖使用轉碼器自動探索，根據使用者的系統上已安裝的轉碼器。For bitmap decoding scenarios, uses automatic codec discovery, based on the installed codecs on the user's system. 影像的寬度與高度上限是 2 ^16 個像素 32 位元，每個通道 \* 4 個通道。The maximum height and width of an image is 2^16 pixels at 32 bits per channel \* 4 channels. 大小上限是 2 ^32 個位元組 (64 gb) 和最大的映像大小為四個 gigapixels。The maximum size of a is 2^32 bytes (64 gigabytes) and the maximum image size is four gigapixels. 最小的映像大小為 1 x 1。The minimum image size is 1x1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立並用做為來源控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a and use it as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapSourceExample.cs#bitmapsourcecreate)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapSourceExample.vb#bitmapsourcecreate)] 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生類別， ，以從映像檔建立點陣圖，並使用它做為來源控制項。The following code example uses a derived class, , to create a bitmap from an image file and use it as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

span.span: This method is used to make sure that pixel copying operations are safe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法才會成功則會傳遞，而且從來源網站，或定義於`pack:`。This method only succeeds if it is passed a that is from a site of origin or that is defined in a `pack:`. 在所有其他情況下，此方法將會失敗。In all other conditions, this method will fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法應該不呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當您呼叫時覆寫此方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when you call the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DecodeFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

summary.span: 當影像因影像標頭損毀而無法載入時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the image fails to load, due to a corrupt image header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage \<*object* DecodeFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* DecodeFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadCompleted As EventHandler

summary.span: 點陣圖內容下載完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the bitmap content has been completely downloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有類型的點陣圖內容，可能不會引發此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

summary.span: 無法下載點陣圖內容時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the bitmap content failed to download.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有類型的點陣圖內容，可能不會引發此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage \<*物件*DownloadFailed ="*EventHandler*」.../ >\<*object* DownloadFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadProgress As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressEventArgs)

summary.span: 點陣圖內容的下載進度變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the download progress of the bitmap content has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有類型的點陣圖內容，可能不會引發此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage \<*object* DownloadProgress="*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* DownloadProgress="*EventHandler*" .../>

summary.span: 使這個執行個體成為指定之 物件的複本。

span.span: Makes this instance a clone of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 請注意，如果這些屬性包含資源參考或資料繫結將會失敗時嘗試凍結物件，而且將會擲回。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 這個方法會呼叫方法並不會呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了呼叫基底實作，同時覆寫此方法時。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)
abstract member GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore : System.Windows.Freezable -> unit override this.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore : System.Windows.Freezable -> unit

span.span: The to copy and freeze.

summary.span: 使這個執行個體成為所指定 的凍結複本。

span.span: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified .

summary.span: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不會呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了呼叫基底實作，同時覆寫此方法時。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information see .
